translation.es: Acusan a cinco policías blancos de golpear a otro oficial,

translation.en: stand accused of beating a fellow officer in Milwaukee, Wisconsin,
translation.es: Acusan a cinco policías blancos de golpear a otro oficial, un hombre negro que trabajaba encubierto en Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

translation.en: a Black man on undercover assignment.
translation.es: un hombre negro que trabajaba encubierto en Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

translation.en: The officer was working undercover Monday night when his vehicle was stopped
translation.es: Estaba trabajando la noche del lunes cuando detuvieron su vehículo

translation.en: on this street for a traffic violation.
translation.es: Estaba trabajando la noche del lunes cuando detuvieron su vehículo por una infracción de tránsito.

translation.en: I gotta say, that smell is worse than ever.
translation.es: Ese olor está peor que nunca.

translation.en: Well, y'know, I had that meat that went bad in that little freezer I got.
translation.es: Bueno, es que tenía carne y se echó a perder en el congelador.

translation.en: No, you said that last week,
and I saw you go out to the dumpster and throw out a whole bunch of bad meat,
translation.es: y te vi ir hasta el basurero y tirar un montón de carne podrida,

translation.en: so the smell should be gone by now.
translation.es: así que ya no debería haber olor.

translation.en: I forgot. My, uh, my tropical fish died.
translation.es: Lo olvidé, murieron mis peces tropicales.

translation.en: They get this disease. It's… it's called ich.
translation.es: Suelen enfermarse de algo llamado Ich.

translation.en: Yeah, that's what they call it.
It's something that has to do with the, uh,
translation.es: Es algo que tiene que ver
con el nivel de pH del agua.

translation.en: Anyway, they all caught it and died, and…
translation.es: En fin, se contagiaron todos y murieron.

translation.en: I'll clean it out this weekend.
Can I buy you a drink?
Oh, well, should we let this gentleman buy us both a drink?
translation.es: ¿Crees que deberíamos permitir que este caballero nos invite algo?

translation.en: He must be a real player.
You bought me a drink before. You know that, right?
translation.es: Sabías que ya me invitaste antes, ¿no?

translation.en: There ain't a lot of white queens walking up in here with their blond hair.
translation.es: No hay muchas reinas blancas por aquí con el cabello así de rubio.
Por si no lo habías notado.

translation.en: You bought me a beer too.
translation.es: A mí también ya me invitaste.

translation.en: Last time I was in here, just last week.
translation.es: La última vez que vine, la semana pasada.

translation.en: Didn't even make a move. Did he?
one more for my other friend here.
translation.es: Una más para mi otro amigo.

translation.en: How long you been drinking tonight, sweetheart?
Well, thank you for the beer, uh…
Jeff, I'm Aaron. This is Don and Tracy.
translation.es: Jeff, yo soy Aaron. Ellos son Don y Tracy.

translation.en: So you gonna make a move on one of us, player?
Or you gonna walk off like last time?
translation.es: ¿O te irás como la última vez?

translation.en: Tonight I'm a man of action.
What does that mean, if you're a fine arts photographer?
translation.es: ¿Y qué hace un fotógrafo de bellas artes?

translation.en: You make, like, portraits and shit?
It's, like, art photography. Artsy stuff.
translation.es: Es la fotografía como arte. Cosas artísticas.

translation.en: You guys wanna pose for me, I could give you 50 bucks.
translation.es: Si posan para mí, podría darles 50 dólares.

translation.en: Are you asking all of us?
Yeah. All you could do it.
translation.es: Sí. Cualquiera de ustedes podría posar.
Solo son cosas artísticas, nada raro.

translation.en: I'm not dropping my drawers for no $50.
Really good bone structure, I can tell.
translation.es: Y una estructura ósea muy buena.

translation.en: I saw you out on the dance floor. The light was hitting it, I could tell.
translation.es: Te vi en la pista de baile. Lo noté cuando te daba la luz.

translation.en: Bitch, my landlord jacked up the rent.
So what the fuck? Don't see y'all offering me no $50.
translation.es: Y no veo que ustedes me ofrezcan $50.

translation.en: All right. Well, maybe we'll stop by later.

translation.es: Vivo en la calle 22 Norte, número 548.

translation.en: Oh, I live just up the street.
What kind of work you do?

translation.es: A lo que sea que consiga.

translation.en: That's the problem. I don't really have a career.
translation.es: El problema es que no tengo una profesión.

translation.en: It's like, this job, that job.
I thought you said you had a house. No, I just said that. I didn't want them bothering us.
translation.es: - Dijiste que vivías en una casa. - Sí, no quería que nos interrumpieran.

translation.en: My family sent me a bunch of meat.
translation.es: Mi familia me envió un montón de carne.

translation.en: But I forgot to plug that little freezer in.
Well, shit. Can I open a window? No.
I don't like opening them up 'cause of the noise.
translation.es: no me gusta abrirlas por el ruido.

translation.en: But I, uh… I have an air conditioner.
What is that floatin' in there?
No, that's probably just dish soap or something like that.
translation.es: Quizá tenía detergente o algo así.

translation.en: Sorry, man. I think I'm gonna go.
translation.es: Disculpa, pero será mejor que me vaya.

translation.en: Why does everybody always wanna leave me?
What you mean, leave you? I need some fresh air. It stinks in here.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? Necesito aire fresco. Aquí apesta.

translation.en: Well, hey, I said I'd turn on the air conditioner.
translation.es: Dije que encendería el aire acondicionado.

translation.en: Okay, well, go turn it on.
Well, I wanna show you around first.
Gotta have a little funeral for him.
You're not supposed to put two of 'em in the same tank.
translation.es: No debería haber dos en una misma pecera.

translation.en: - Stop! - Where you going? Stop trying to leave.
You're gonna make me do things I don't wanna do.
translation.es: Me harás hacer cosas que no quiero.

translation.en: - Okay. - Or I'll fuckin' kill you.
All right? It's just for the photos. I was kidding.
translation.es: ¿Está bien? Es solo para las fotos. Es un juego.

translation.en: - You're pointing a knife at me! - Calm down and I won't have to.
translation.es: - ¡Me apuntas con un cuchillo! - Porque no te calmas.

translation.en: Why do you have to get all emotional?
Just calm down, go in there.
translation.es: Solo cálmate y ve al dormitorio.

translation.en: - Go on. - I'm not going in there!
Now, that's where the air conditioner is, okay?
- Please! - Okay. Okay, I'll go. I'll go in there.
translation.es: - ¡Por favor! - De acuerdo, sí. Ya voy.

translation.en: We're gonna hang out, gonna watch a movie.
translation.es: Pasaremos un rato juntos y veremos una película.

translation.en: What're we gonna do in here?
Quit doing that! Stop trying to leave.
I told you I'm gonna pay you.
Hey, let's go in the other room, okay?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vamos a la sala?

translation.en: - I wanna watch the movie. - Yeah, I know.
translation.es: - Quiero ver la película. - Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: We'll watch the movie in a second, okay?
I have an idea, and I think…
Okay, what do you wanna show me?
I mean, you want to take some photos, right?
But you gotta put that knife down.
You wanna take some photos, right?
I wanna watch the movie now.
We'll watch the movie first, but I want to take some nudes, all right?
translation.es: Veremos la película, pero toma algunos desnudos, ¿sí?

translation.en: That's why you brought me here, right? All right.
translation.es: Para eso me trajiste, ¿no? Muy bien.

translation.en: Hey, you know. I don't like horror movies, honey.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? No me gustan las películas de terror, cariño.
es solo parte de la vida.

translation.en: Why you so nervous? I'm not.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué tan nervioso? - No es así.

translation.en: Are you scared of the movie or are you scared of me?
translation.es: ¿Le temes a la película o a mí?

translation.en: Hold on. I'm just gonna skip to the best part.
Can I listen to your heartbeat?
I want to hear your heart
Officers, this motherfucker down the street…
translation.es: Oficiales, un hijo de puta al final de la calle…

translation.en: - Whoa. Stay where you are. - He tried to--
You high? You take something tonight?
'Cause he tried to fucking kill me.
I'm telling you. Black people are disappearing all over the city.
translation.es: Hay muchas personas negras que han desaparecido en la ciudad…

translation.en: - Can I help you? - Is that him?
he and I, we're both, uh, homosexuals, so… you know.
- He wanted to play cops and robbers. - No, I didn't.
translation.es: - Jugamos a policías y ladrones. - Mentira.

translation.en: Hey, you let us handle this, okay?
Well, like I said before, we were just, uh, playing around and, uh…
translation.es: Como les dije, solo estábamos jugando y…

translation.en: I guess us gay guys can get into that roughhousing frat boy stuff.
translation.es: Los gais a veces actuamos como chicos de fraternidad y…

translation.en: Do you have the key to the handcuffs?
translation.es: - ¿Tiene la llave de las esposas? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, they're-- It's somewhere in here. I just, uh…
I think it might be in a drawer. Um…
I'll find it. I'll be right back.
You mind if we come in?
- You want to come in? - Hell no.
I really like cooking pork chops,
translation.es: Me gustan las chuletas de cerdo, y mi familia me envió mucha carne,

translation.en: and family sent me a bunch of meat, but it all went bad.
translation.es: Me gustan las chuletas de cerdo, y mi familia me envió mucha carne, pero se echó a perder.

translation.en: - Is there anyone else here right now? - No.
Where's this key, do you think?
I think it might be in the bedroom.
I'll find it. - There's a bunch of gay stuff in there. - Hey, we'll take a look.
translation.es: - Iré yo. Hay muchas cosas gais. - Echaremos un vistazo.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I think it's, uh…

translation.es: Sí, en la mesa de noche.

translation.en: - Got him? - Yeah, I got him.
Sir, you're under arrest for the attempted murder…
translation.es: Señor, queda detenido por el intento de homicidio

translation.en: You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law.
translation.es: Tiene derecho a guardar silencio. Lo que diga podrá ser usado en su contra.

translation.en: You killed my people, you motherfucker.
translation.es: Mataste a los míos, hijo de puta.

translation.en: - Fuck you, piece of shit! - You understand the rights I read?
For what I did I should be dead.
translation.es: Debería morir por lo que hice.

translation.en: I hope you die, motherfucker. Fuck you. I fucking hope you die, you piece of shit.
translation.es: Ojalá te mueras, hijo de puta. Vete a la mierda. Ojalá te mueras.

translation.en: All these people been living in here, all this time
translation.es: Toda esta gente ha estado viviendo aquí

translation.en: with the smell and all these sounds coming out of there, and we--
translation.es: con el olor y los ruidos que salen de ahí, y…

translation.en: - Officer, officer, clear a lane. - Ma'am, back in your apartment.
translation.es: - Abran paso. - Señora, regrese a su apartamento.

translation.en: - I'm not going back in my apartment! - Back inside.
- No, you gonna listen to me! - Nobody in until the detectives show.
translation.es: - Esperen a que lleguen los inspectores. - ¡Escúcheme!

translation.en: And it's because I called y'all.
I called y'all, and I told you over and over a million times
translation.es: ¡Los llamé un millón de veces y les dije una y otra vez que pasaba algo!

translation.en: that something was going on, and you know what you did?
translation.es: ¡Los llamé un millón de veces y les dije una y otra vez que pasaba algo! ¿Y qué hicieron?

translation.en: So what did y'all find in there? Huh?
What did you find in there?
Yeah, I'll be there right away.
Mr. Dahmer, I'm Detective Kennedy with the Milwaukee Police Department.
translation.es: Señor Dahmer, soy el inspector Kennedy, de la Policía de Milwaukee.

translation.en: We're going to apologize in advance, Mr. Dahmer.
translation.es: Señor Dahmer, nos disculparemos de antemano.

translation.en: This is likely to be a difficult conversation.
Jeffrey was arrested late last night.
Attempted murder. We'd just like to ask you some questions about him.
translation.es: Intento de homicidio. Quisiéramos hacerle algunas preguntas.

translation.en: When you said there was a murder investigation,
I thought someone might have tried to murder him.
translation.es: pensé que él había sido la víctima.

translation.en: But he was a quiet boy. He was a good boy.
translation.es: Pero era muy tranquilo. Era un buen muchacho.

translation.en: When his mother and I divorced, it was very hard on him.
translation.es: Cuando me divorcié de su madre, fue muy duro para él.

translation.en: He just turned 18. He was living alone at the time.
translation.es: Había cumplido 18 años. Vivía solo en ese momento.

translation.en: I'm sorry.  I'm sorry for becoming emotional.
translation.es: Lo siento. Disculpen que me ponga así.

translation.en: Is there anything else you'd like to tell us?
When he was young, I think he was four,
translation.es: De pequeño, creo que tenía cuatro años,

translation.en: And he was never the same after that.
translation.es: Nunca fue el mismo después de eso.

translation.en: there was brain damage from, you know, too much anesthesia.
translation.es: Quizá sufrió algún daño cerebral por exceso de anestesia.

translation.en: It's haunted me.  A hernia operation?
translation.es: - Siempre me lo pregunté. - ¿Una operación de hernia?

translation.en: You think that it might have, what?
Could you tell me a little bit about what he did?
translation.es: ¿Podrían contarme un poco qué fue lo que hizo?

translation.en: Who this person was that he tried to kill, I guess.
translation.es: ¿Quién era la persona a la que intentó matar?

translation.en: You're aware that your son is homosexual, yes?
Allegedly, he lured a man back to his apartment and tried to kill him.
translation.es: Al parecer, llevó a un hombre a su apartamento e intentó matarlo.

translation.en: and when the police arrived to arrest your son,
translation.es: y cuando llegó la policía para arrestar a su hijo,

translation.en: items around the apartment that indicate
translation.es: elementos en el apartamento que indican…

translation.en: that your son has committed multiple murders.
translation.es: que su hijo ha cometido múltiples asesinatos.

translation.en: What items? What… What are you talking about?
I'm just gonna tell you right now,
this is gonna be difficult to hear, Mr. Dahmer.
translation.es: que será difícil escuchar esto, señor Dahmer.

translation.en: There was a human head in his refrigerator.
translation.es: Había una cabeza humana en el refrigerador.

translation.en: Two plastic bags in the freezer.
translation.es: En el congelador, dos bolsas de plástico.
Cada una contenía un corazón humano.

translation.en: Another containing a set of male genitalia.

translation.es: y fotografías que documentaban los desmembramientos.

translation.en: In another drawer, we found a complete human skeleton,
translation.es: En otro cajón, encontramos un esqueleto humano completo.
Y luego un tanque de 200 litros

translation.en: as well as other body parts
translation.es: junto con otras partes de los cuerpos.

translation.en: that he was attempting to dissolve or…
strip the tissue off the bones.
translation.es: separar el tejido de los huesos.

translation.en: And, uh, we should just tell you
that based on debris on some of the cooking utensils we found
translation.es: que, basándonos en los restos hallados en utensilios de cocina

translation.en: and the marks on some of the body parts,
translation.es: y en las marcas presentes en algunas partes de los cuerpos,

translation.en: as well as things your son mentioned to us,
translation.es: así como en las cosas que su hijo nos mencionó,

translation.en: he ate some of his victims.
translation.es: que se comió a algunas víctimas.

translation.en: Now, we realize that this is a lot for you to process.
translation.es: Sabemos que es mucho para procesar,

translation.en: So we're gonna leave you alone for a few minutes
translation.es: así que lo dejaremos solo unos minutos

translation.en: Some neighbors here had complained of a stench for almost a year,
translation.es: Los vecinos se habían quejado de un fuerte hedor durante casi un año,

translation.en: but they never imagined what might be causing it.
translation.es: pero nunca imaginaron cuál sería la fuente.

translation.en: Milwaukee police were led to an apartment in this building
translation.es: La policía de Milwaukee entró al apartamento

translation.en: after they were flagged down by a handcuffed man
translation.es: porque un hombre esposado los detuvo
y les dijo que lo habían atacado.

translation.en: What they discovered upon their arrival was almost unspeakable.
translation.es: Lo que descubrieron al llegar es casi indescriptible.

translation.en: Numerous pieces from as many as 15 human bodies.
translation.es: Varias partes de hasta 15 cuerpos humanos.

translation.en: It's obvious that there has been a number of human specimens
translation.es: Se han encontrado varios ejemplares humanos

translation.en: - found within the apartment… - …and to a certain extent, they're hidden in there.
translation.es: dentro del apartamento, que, hasta cierto punto…

translation.en: A hazardous materials team, breathing from air tanks,
confiscated a number of items from the suspect's apartment.
Among them, they say, photographs and drawings
translation.es: Entre ellos, dicen, había fotografías y dibujos de cadáveres mutilados

translation.en: of dead, mutilated bodies and a vat of acid.
translation.es: había fotografías y dibujos de cadáveres mutilados y un tanque lleno de ácido.

translation.en: Police believe the suspect may have used the acid to dissolve body parts.
translation.es: La policía cree que el sospechoso usó el ácido para disolver cadáveres.

translation.en: Ma'am, you have to leave the premises.
We're asking all residents to evacuate for our investigation and their safety.
translation.es: Evacuamos a todos los residentes por nuestra investigación y su seguridad.

translation.en: Where exactly am I supposed to go? The entire building's a crime scene.
translation.es: - ¿Y adónde se supone que iré? - El edificio es una escena del crimen.

translation.en: There's toxic chemicals in here that could be a hazard.
translation.es: Hay químicos tóxicos que son peligrosos.
